title: Bookkeeping Support Needed
description: Growing creative agency needs monthly bookkeeping support. We've been managing in-house but are behind on reconciliations and need someone to bring us up to date and then maintain monthly. Using Xero, approximately 200 transactions per month.
outcome_sought: Accurate, up-to-date financial records that let us focus on client work and make informed business decisions

explicit_matches.fit_notes: Need ongoing monthly support matching our transaction volume

service_need_details.scope_description: Bring 3 months of bookkeeping up to date, then provide ongoing monthly reconciliation and reporting
service_need_details.estimated_effort: 10-15 hours initial catch-up, then 4-6 hours monthly

contextual_factors.description: Cannot complete year-end accounts without up-to-date bookkeeping
